INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
INVALID_PASSWORD: The password must be at least 6 characters
INVALID_FIRST_NAME: Please enter a valid first name
INVALID_LAST_NAME: Please enter a valid last name
GENERAL_ERROR: An error occured, please try again later
RULE_1: 1. Game predictions must be submitted before the start of the match.
RULE_2: 2. After the start of the game, the guesses of all the participants will be visible.
RULE_3: 3. For a correctly guessed result:-3 points.
RULE_4: 4. For correctly guessing the result when no one else guessed the the result: -7 points.
RULE_5: 5. For correctly guessing the result when no one else guessed the outcome of the game: -11 points.
RULE_6: 6. For a predicted outcome of the game (guessing which team will win or guessing a draw): 0 points.
RULE_7: 7. For unannounced end of the game: +3 points.
RULE_8: 8. For each missed goal: +1 additional point.
RULE_9: 9. The participant who does not make a guess in time receives the same points as the participant who guessed the worst.
RULE_10: 10. If several participants have the same number of points, the higher place is taken by the participant who guessed more results.
RULE_11: 11. The competition ended with the result 2:1
RULE_12: 12. The participant who guessed 2:1 gets -3 points (for a correctly result)
RULE_13: 13. The participant who guessed 3:0 gets +2 points (for two incorrect goals).
RULE_14: 14. The participant who guessed 1:1 gets +4 points (for one incorrect goal).
STATISTICS_HEADER_TEXT: Championship has ended! Statistics are available
